column1: Daily Weather Observations for Yulara, Northern Territory for September 2025
Prepared at 07:00 UTC on Saturday  6 September 2025   IDCJDW8056.202509

Yulara Airport is about 20 kilometres away from Uluru. Some cloud observations are from automated equipment; these are somewhat different to those made by a human observer and may not appear every day.
Observations were drawn from Yulara Airport {station 015635}
